channel.title: Harden DRACUT initramfs-generator by disabling Recovery Console?
channel.description:
After https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/harden-grub-bootloader-using-bootloader-password/723 has been implemented...
Should disable dracut recovery console?
Should set kernel parameters:
rd.shell=0 rd.emergency=halt
As per https://serverfault.com/questions/554853/how-can-i-secure-the-dracut-shell?
